sources.provenance: Headlam Group plc Annual Report and Accounts 2025 - Published via London Stock Exchange
sources.usage: Primary test document for Docling extraction validation. Contains financial tables, ESG disclosures, and structured sections suitable for testing table extraction and layout preservation.

sources.provenance: Apple Inc. Form 10-K Annual Report 2023 - SEC Filing
sources.usage: Secondary validation document for testing financial table extraction (balance sheets, income statements, cash flow). Complex multi-level table structures.

sources.provenance: JPMorgan Chase & Co. Form 10-K Annual Report 2023 - SEC Filing
sources.usage: Tertiary validation document for testing risk disclosure tables and regulatory reporting formats.

sources.provenance: Exxon Mobil Corporation Form 10-K Annual Report 2023 - SEC Filing
sources.usage: Validation document for ESG metrics tables (GHG emissions, energy consumption, environmental data).

sources.provenance: Synthetic ESG report created for unit testing purposes. Contains minimal representative content.
sources.usage: Unit test fixture for rapid determinism validation. Small file size for fast test execution. Contains 1-2 tables and basic document structure.

validation_notes.sha256_computation: Computed via `sha256sum <file>` on Windows Git Bash or `Get-FileHash <file> -Algorithm SHA256` on PowerShell
validation_notes.file_accessibility: All files in data/raw/ must be accessible for CP tests. Missing files will cause test skips with pytest.skip()
validation_notes.fixture_creation: tests/fixtures/sample_report.pdf must be created before Phase 1 implementation

update_frequency: static (annual reports do not change post-publication)
